pm.name: Name
pm.JobDescriptionsPageDescription: To find a Job Description, search for name or filter by function, level and grade. To view the details of a Job Description, click its name or choose Edit job description from the Actions menu.
pm.SuccessProfilesPageDescription: To find a Success Profile, search for name or filter by function and level. To view the details of a Success Profile, click its name. From the Actions menu, you can create a job description or create a new success profile (clone).
pm.JDSearch_NoResults: You have no existing Job Descriptions.
pm.interviewGuideBEHNotFound: An interview guide cannot be created from this success profile. Please add behavioral competencies and try again.
pm.JDcontent: This job description has not been saved. Do you want to proceed and discard the job description?
pm.successProfileRemoveModalContent: This will remove the selected success profile.  Are you sure you want to proceed?

pm.JDDiscardAllChanges: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

pm.editReviewJobDescription: Review and edit the Job Description before saving.
pm.createReviewJobDescription: Review and update content before creating your job description.
pm.traitsDriversMessage: New 2018 norms underpinning the Traits and Drivers now enable you to choose between a global or location-specific norm - useful if you use Success Profiles to run assessments. We've upgraded all Success Profiles to the latest norms, whilst retaining any adjustments you may have made. You may notice some changes to the resulting traits and driver scores. We have not updated the traits and drivers used in any assessment projects.

pm.roleLocationHelp: The levels shown for Traits and Drivers (psychometrics) are adjusted for the Role Location selected. The Role Location can be adjusted while editing a custom Success Profile.
pm.accountabilityTagline: Accountability, at its core, means responsibility for results.

pm.aspectsSetDescription: Measure of cognitive ability including verbal, numerical and checking tests.
pm.elementsNumericalDescription: Elements Numerical measures the ability to reason with numerical information and data. This is important for working with budgets or analyzing business data.
pm.elementsVerbalTestDescription: Elements Verbal measures the ability to interpret verbal information and reach correct conclusions. This is important for understanding business information and report writing.
pm.elementsLogicalTestDescription: Elements Logical measures the ability to analyze abstract information and apply this to determine outcomes and patterns, such as completing sequences of shapes. This is used in a variety of roles requiring complex problem-solving (e.g. IT, engineering and scientists), as well as âculture-freeâ input to measuring potential.
pm.aspectsNumericalTestDescription: The Aspects Ability Numerical test is designed to measure a candidateâs ability to analyze and draw inferences from numerical information and data.
pm.aspectsVerbalTestDescription: The Aspects Ability Verbal test is designed to measure a candidateâs ability to interpret verbal information and reach correct conclusions.
pm.aspectsCheckingTestDescription: The Aspects Ability Checking test is designed to measure a candidateâs ability to quickly and accurately detect errors in data.
pm.jePercentageUnlikely: Know-How - Problem Solving combination is unlikely
pm.jePercentageImprobable: Know-How - Problem Solving combination is improbable

pm.recruitDescription: Find complete information needed to source candidates, from role responsibilities to required skills, education, experience, along with market insights like pay ranges for a given role.
pm.payDescription: Get a high-level sense of the compensation landscape for a given role.
pm.softSkillsHighlight: Technical Competencies are not highlighted for executive roles but can be found in the details
pm.personalityDriversHighlight: Personality Traits and Drivers are not highlighted for entry level roles but can be found in the details.
pm.cognitiveAbilitiesHighlight: Cognitive Abilities are not highlighted for executive roles but can be found in the details

pm.marketBaseSalaryIntro: Eliminate the distorting effect of extreme values to give an accurate view of the market.
